feds.admin_not_in_fed: User {user} is not a {name} Federation admin
feds.no_fbanned_in_fed: Noone user was banned in {fed_name} Federation!
feds.fban_creator: How I can ban Federation creator?! I don't think it's funny.
feds.fban_fed_admin: I'm not banning a fed admin from their own fed!

text.i6: - /welcomesecurity <off/soft/hard>: soft - restrict user's permission to send media files for 24 hours, hard - restict user's permission to send messages until they click on the button 'I'm not a bot'

text.a3: Note: Please keep in mind, SophieBot use notes for rules, you must create note with rules text and set it
